pages.text: Grants the player Strength III (5 minutes), Frost Resistance II (5 minutes), Nourishment (5 minutes), Corpse Eater III (1 minute)$(br)Also increases armor by 15 points and armor toughness by 10 points in a non-buff form

After intercepting a memory hidden in some ashes, the content about the taste of ashes piqued your curiosity.$(br)As the final material trace of a person, ashes contain those pasts that dare not be forgotten.$(br)But as a dark wizard, following rules is not one of your choices.$(br)The journey to pursue the ultimate taste never stops, if you're going to do it, make the best bowl of rice, which will be a grand feast for the soul ritual.$(br)With a hammer and metal ingots, you completely destroyed the Bone Lord, grinding it into fine powder, then sprinkled it into the bowl, allowing it to fuse with the grains of rice.$(br)Unbelievable...

It's not pungent or tasteless, it is... it is a charming, rich flavor belonging to the majesty of a high-ranking lord.$(br)It's the slightly spicy spark of clashing swords and blades, it's also the icy sweetness of hope's disappearance, the fear yet desire to move forward when reading forbidden texts.$(br)After hastily devouring a bowl of rice, you're satisfied to feel yourself guarded by a cold armor, desecrating divine undead, which is indeed worthy of reward.$(br)You truly have no respect for these ancient beings.
